subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The Kenyan Riders, who one day hope to compete in the Tour de France, are a squad of competitive cyclists who have managed to introduce cycling to a country with virtually no history of it.
snippet: The Kenyan Riders, who one day hope to compete in the Tour de France, are a squad of competitive cyclists who have managed to introduce cycling to a country with virtually no history of it.
